exceptions.exn: The LHS of validPtUn (valid (pts _ _ \\+ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of V (valid s) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of is_true_true true does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H1 : true H : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (v : V) (f : U), valid (pts k v \\+ f) = [&& UMC.p (UMC.class U) k, valid f & k \ otin dom f] s : soup V : valid s m : msg TaggedMessage Unable to unify "true" with "valid (s \\+ fresh s \\\\-> m)".

original: simpl. unfold post_msg. simpl. rewrite validPtUn. rewrite V. simpl. rewrite is_true_true. reflexivity.
